players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Charlie, why did you remain silent? We need everyone talking to find the mafia."
Diana: "I agree with Alice, Charlie. Staying silent only helps the mafia. We should all share our thoughts."
You: "I think we need to look at voting patterns. Who are you all considering voting for and why?"
Diana: "I think we should vote for Charlie. Staying silent is suspicious, and with only four of us, we can't afford to be passive."

Charlie: "I'd like to clarify my silence from last night. I was gathering information and waiting for the right moment to share it. Diana, your admission of wanting to vote for me based on my silence is concerning. I believe we should all focus on finding the real..."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
